data.name: AccessDenied_Header
data.value: Access to this page was denied

data.name: AccessDenied_Info
data.value: You tried to access a page you don't have permissions for. See the main panel for some reasons this may have happened.

data.name: AccessDenied_Rant
data.value:
The Swarmops security framework has denied you access to the page you were trying to go to. This usually means that its functions were above the access levels granted to you for the currently selected organization ({0}). This has not been logged nor reported anywhere.

There are several reasons why this may have happened:

data.name: ChangeOrganizations_Info
data.value: You can be taking part in several organizations on this Swarmops installation. Here is where you switch between them.

data.name: ChangeOrganizations_NothingToChange
data.value: You're not participating in any other organization on this Swarmops installation, so you can't switch to something else. Therefore, we're going back to Dashboard instead.

data.name: DatabaseUpgradeRequired_Info
data.value: This page requires an upgraded Swarmops database.

data.name: DatabaseUpgradeRequired_Rant
data.value:
There is a database upgrade pending that prevents your access to this page. This is a temporary condition and the Swarmops servers should already be working on performing the necessary upgrade.

Retry loading the page in a few minutes. If the condition persists for more than fifteen minutes, contact your system administrator.

data.name: LockdownAccount_Failed
data.value: The account was not locked down. There is no such account, or the ticket was invalid or too old. If you still want to lock down this account, contact the administrators of this Swarmops installation.

data.name: LockdownAccount_Info
data.value: If you're seeing this page, you're trying to lock down a user account for security reasons. If the link was valid and hasn't expired, the account is already locked down.

data.name: LockdownAccount_Success
data.value: The account has been successfully locked down and any active sessions are now terminated.

data.name: Login_AsOpenLedgers
data.value:
OPEN LEDGERS

{0} is running Open Ledgers. This means that anybody may inspect the financial reports and bookkeeping. You have been logged on to the organization's Operations to do just that.

data.name: Login_BitIdEnabled
data.value:
BitId two-factor authentication is now enabled.

From now on, you can use your bitcoin wallet to log in (and will need to do so). Thank you for enabling added security.

Please remember to keep your phone secure with a password, too.

data.name: Login_BitIdRequired_Dialog
data.value:
BITID LOGIN REQUIRED

This login requires BitId authentication, as enabled by the account holder. You cannot log on with a username/password combination.

data.name: Login_GoogleAuthenticatorCodeHelp
data.value: Enter your code from Google Authenticator.

data.name: Login_Info
data.value: Login to Swarmops using your bitid-enabled bitcoin wallet. You do not need any funds in it. If you don't have a bitid-enabled bitcoin wallet, you can log in manually using a legacy username and password. (Your username is your name or email.)

data.name: Login_UnknownBitIdAddress
data.value: Swarmops doesn't recognize this address. Please log in manually and activate your address before using it to login.

data.name: Login_UseManualLogin
data.comment: Switches from BitId to Username/Password form

data.name: ResetPassword_Failed
data.value:
There is no valid password reset ticket for this mail address, the address does not exist, the password reset ticket is invalid, or it has expired.

Password reset failed.

data.name: ResetPassword_Info
data.value: You're resetting the password for a user account. Enter your new password twice to set it and login. (If you're trying to start the password-reset procedure, you need a ticket to do so. Create a ticket.)

data.name: ResetPassword_InfoRequest
data.value: Enter your mail address to receive instructions how to proceed with the password reset procedure. The instructions will contain a unique and expiring code that you will need to use to proceed.

data.name: ResetPassword_NewPasswordsDontMatch
data.value: The two passwords do not match. Please retry.

data.name: ResetPassword_NoEmpty
data.value: The new password cannot be empty.

data.name: ResetPassword_RequestInfo
data.value: You may reset the password associated with an mail address. A link with a ticket code will be sent to that mail address, which you must follow to reset your password.

data.name: ResetPassword_Success
data.value: Your password was changed and you have been logged on to Swarmops using your new password.

data.name: ResetPassword_TicketSentMaybe
data.value:
If the mail address was associated with an account on this Swarmops installation, a reset ticket has been sent. Open that mail and click the link in the mail to reset your password. (If the email did not exist, nothing was sent.)

You may close this browser tab. It is not needed anymore.
